algorithm_technique: Sorting and iterating to find maximum gaps between special floors.
problem_summary_simple: Find the longest stretch of non-special floors between the bottom and top floors.
problem_summary_technical: Sort special floors and calculate max difference between adjacent special floors and boundaries.
key_insights: Sorting the special floors is crucial to easily identify consecutive segments.
The maximum consecutive floors will occur either before the first special floor, after the last, or between two adjacent special floors.
The number of floors in a range [a, b] is b - a + 1. The number of non-special floors between special[i-1] and special[i] is special[i] - special[i-1] - 1.
